thread.title: South Africa's Eskom to spend $456 mln on power grid this year
thread.title_full: South Africa's Eskom to spend $456 mln on power grid this year

title: South Africa's Eskom to spend $456 mln on power grid this year
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
JOHANNESBURG, Oct 16 (Reuters) - South Africa's Eskom will spend 6 billion rand ($456 million) to strengthen the transmission grid this year...
